title: Trailer - Echoes Through Time - Immersive Conversations With History’s Greatest Minds
description: A 60-second, cinematic teaser for Echoes Through Time. Join Leo, our plucky time-traveler, as he previews weekly 40-minute interviews with history’s greatest minds—packed with immersive sound, verified facts, sharp humor, and dinner-worthy insights. Hit follow and start traveling.

intro.speaker: Narrator
intro.text: Gather close, dear traveler—this is Echoes Through Time, where every week young Leo leaps through centuries to share a fireside chat with the giants who shaped our world.

intro.speaker: SFX
intro.text: low fireplace crackle at 40 % volume with distant solo violin phrase, gently ducking to 15 % under dialogue and fading after ten seconds

arrival_scene.speaker: SFX
arrival_scene.text: rising wind whoosh peaking at 70 % then cutting to silence, faint electric hum, soft shoe-thud on gravel, wind drops to 0 % within two seconds

arrival_scene.speaker: Narrator
arrival_scene.text: Through that swirling fog stumbles our wide-eyed time-traveller Leo—straight into history.

conversation.speaker: Leo
conversation.text: Whoa. <break time="0.8s"/>Time travel really never gets old! <break time="0.4s"/>Napoleon? Is that really you?

conversation.speaker: Napoleon
conversation.text: I never won by chance, mon ami—every risk was carefully calculated.

conversation.speaker: SFX
conversation.text: gentle time-shift sound with soft metallic shimmer, fading naturally

conversation.speaker: Marcus Aurelius
conversation.text: Obice via est. The obstacle is the way, young traveler.

conversation.speaker: SFX
conversation.text: subtle temporal transition with light chime-like quality, dissolving smoothly

conversation.speaker: Cleopatra
conversation.text: Power, my dear, is pure theatre.

conversation.speaker: SFX
conversation.text: delicate time-ripple effect with soft crystalline tones, gracefully dissipating

conversation.speaker: Charles Darwin
conversation.text: Adapt—or vanish. Nature is not sentimental.

conversation.speaker: Leo
conversation.text: Episodes on Napoleon's Gambit, Cleopatra's Stagecraft, and Darwin's Survival Code are already waiting. New chats drop every Tuesday—just bring your curiosity.

outro.speaker: Narrator
outro.text: History's giants, one conversation at a time—discover the fascinating lives behind the legends.

outro.speaker: Leo
outro.text: Follow now—and journey with me through time as history's most fascinating figures share their stories in your feed each week.

outro.speaker: SFX
outro.text: clock tick accelerating from 20 % to 60 %, merging into triumphant brass fanfare with military drums swelling to 80 % then fading to silence over three seconds
